page.title: 08A Local Leisure Centre.
page.content: {My Local Leisure Centre written by {Tania Perez. Abertillery Leisure Centre is quite big.Outside the main entrance there is a paved area and by the side of this there is a carpark.The centre is a brick and concrete building with a flat roof made of concrete and gravel. There are three floors to the leisure centre,the ground floor is the basement ,here there is a small gymnasium with squash courts and saunas, there is also access to the carpark.The second floor houses the main and learner pools as well as the changing rooms.The main pool is 25 yards by 10 yards.The learner pool is 10 yards by 5 yards.There is a 25 pence entrance fee.
